490076.Title: All the Boys Love Mandy Lane
490076.title: All the Boys Love Mandy Lane
490076.cast: Anson Mount, Edwin Hodge, Michael Welch, Brooke Bloom, Amber Heard, Aaron Himelstein, Whitney Able, Luke Grimes, Melissa Price
490076.description: During a weekend excursion to a secluded ranch, an unwelcome visitor begins picking off the randy admirers of teenage temptress Mandy Lane.
